definition: thin or slender/finely particulate/thin and soft/fine/delicate/trifling/(of a sound) quiet/frugal
powder/cosmetic face powder/food prepared from starch/noodles or pasta made from any kind of flour/whitewash/white/pink

sentences.english: The secondary screens receive the coal from the crushers and remove the fines.
sentences.chinese: 经压碎后的煤通过第二道筛，筛出细粉。

sentences.english: Super fine walnut shell used widely now and will be used more widely in the future.
sentences.chinese: 核桃壳超细粉的用途比较广泛，具有广阔的市场前景。

sentences.english: Very si-milar results can be obtained when industrial high-pure, ultra-fine powders are used.
sentences.chinese: 用工业生产的高纯超细粉体可重复获得相近的性能。

sentences.english: Round vibrating screen is high precise sieving machine for fine powder with low noise and high efficiency.
sentences.chinese: 圆振动筛是高精度筛分机的细粉与低噪声和高效率。

sentences.english: The supply source of silicon power is rare, but it may be re-placed with super-fine kaolin clay.
sentences.chinese: 硅粉货源有限，可用高活性偏高岭土超细粉代替。

sentences.english: One involves trimming short hair to create a fine powder.
sentences.chinese: 一个关于用修剪的短发产生细粉。

sentences.english: Water-honeyed pills are made of fine powder of crude drugs, using honey and water as binders.
sentences.chinese: 水蜜丸系指药材细粉以蜂蜜和水为黏合剂制成的丸剂。

sentences.english: Disclosed is a process for producing an ultrafine powder of aluminum nitride.
sentences.chinese: 披露是生产的氮化铝超细粉加工。

sentences.english: Ball mill is an efficient tool for grinding many materials into fine powder.
sentences.chinese: 球磨机是一种有效的工具磨许多材料成细粉。

sentences.english: Fine particles in flue gas can be agglomerated by electric agglomeration.
sentences.chinese: 电凝并是提高超细粉尘颗粒脱除效率的有效方法之一。

sentences.english: We strongly recommend all industries to apply new power material - aluminum-silicon composite ultra-fine power.
sentences.chinese: 欢迎各行业应用新型粉体料，一铝硅复保超细粉。

sentences.english: Borax must be reduced to powder for infants.
sentences.chinese: 硼砂必须研成细粉才能供婴儿使用。

sentences.english: Guangfu Building Materials is a large scale of manufacturer of ultrafine powder in China.
sentences.chinese: 广福建材是国内较大规模的超细粉体生产企业之一。

sentences.english: The foreground of preparation ultrafine powder by spraying drying was gived.
sentences.chinese: 给出了喷雾干燥法制备超细粉末的应用前景。

sentences.english: A mill grinds grain into flour.
sentences.chinese: 碾磨机把谷物磨成细粉。

definition: milling/to grind/to polish by grinding/to abrade/whetstone/pestle
to dry over a fire/to roast
peach kernel, used in Chinese medicine
to mash/to beat to a pulp
